name: Another One Loops the Dust
description:
Another One Loops the Dust
After an exhausting day at work you just want to relax and listen to some music. You set up your record player and let it do its work.
Sadly, your home is a mess and  full of dust so that the song starts to slow down and ruin the mood. But there's hope: Hansel the Hamster! Can he save the day or will the song stuck in an endless loop of disappointment?!

How to play
You should play with sound
Move with left mouse button
Switch tool with right mouse button

Clean up dust with the broom and scratches with the hammer. Try cleaning up the record, before dust or scratches hit the needle. Dust will slow it down and scratches will make the needle jump.

Team

Helen - Design, Animations, Programming
Sven (justsWn) - Programming, Sound

Software
* Unity
* Some graphic programs
* Visual Studio

Music
* "Take on Me" by a-ha reinterpreted by Stefan
* 15 second loop from a free track from https://freemusicarchive.org slightly changed by us

(All rights belong to their respective owners.)

We hope you enjoy cleaning the record and having a song loop inside your head! Greetings from Germany :-)
